body_html:
@yongtang It seems like there is also an issue with the Linux ARM build:

11:44:48 /android/ndk/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.9/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-g++ --std=c++11 -DIS_SLIM_BUILD -fno-exceptions -DNDEBUG -O2 --sysroot /android/ndk/platforms/android-21/arch-arm -Wno-narrowing -fomit-frame-pointer -march=armv7-a -mfloat-abi=softfp -mfpu=neon -fPIE -MT /workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/obj/tensorflow/core/platform/posix/posix_file_system.o -MMD -MP -MF /workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/dep//tensorflow/core/platform/posix/posix_file_system.Td -I/android/ndk/sources/android/support/include -I/android/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include -I/android/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/libs/armeabi/include -I. -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/ -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/eigen -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/gemmlowp -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/public -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/fft2d -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/protobuf/include -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto/ -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto_text/ -c tensorflow/core/platform/posix/posix_file_system.cc -o 
11:44:50 tensorflow/core/platform/posix/posix_file_system.cc: In member function 'virtual tensorflow::Status tensorflow::PosixFileSystem::CopyFile(const string&, const string&)':
11:44:50 tensorflow/core/platform/posix/posix_file_system.cc:307:54: error: cannot convert 'off_t* {aka long int*}' to 'off64_t* {aka long long int*}' for argument '3' to 'ssize_t sendfile64(int, int, off64_t*, size_t)'
11:44:50      rc = sendfile64(target_fd, src_fd, &offset, chunk);
11:44:50                                                       ^
body:
@yongtang It seems like there is also an issue with the Linux ARM build:

```c++
11:44:48 /android/ndk/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.9/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-g++ --std=c++11 -DIS_SLIM_BUILD -fno-exceptions -DNDEBUG -O2 --sysroot /android/ndk/platforms/android-21/arch-arm -Wno-narrowing -fomit-frame-pointer -march=armv7-a -mfloat-abi=softfp -mfpu=neon -fPIE -MT /workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/obj/tensorflow/core/platform/posix/posix_file_system.o -MMD -MP -MF /workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/dep//tensorflow/core/platform/posix/posix_file_system.Td -I/android/ndk/sources/android/support/include -I/android/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include -I/android/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/libs/armeabi/include -I. -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/ -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/eigen -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/gemmlowp -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/public -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/fft2d -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/protobuf/include -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto/ -I/workspace/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen/proto_text/ -c tensorflow/core/platform/posix/posix_file_system.cc -o 
11:44:50 tensorflow/core/platform/posix/posix_file_system.cc: In member function 'virtual tensorflow::Status tensorflow::PosixFileSystem::CopyFile(const string&, const string&)':
11:44:50 tensorflow/core/platform/posix/posix_file_system.cc:307:54: error: cannot convert 'off_t* {aka long int*}' to 'off64_t* {aka long long int*}' for argument '3' to 'ssize_t sendfile64(int, int, off64_t*, size_t)'
11:44:50      rc = sendfile64(target_fd, src_fd, &offset, chunk);
11:44:50                                                       ^
```
